name: ValueListenableBuilder
desc: A widget whose content stays synced with a [ValueListenable].

fields.name: valueListenable
fields.desc: The [ValueListenable] whose value you depend on in order to build.

fields.name: builder
fields.desc: A [ValueWidgetBuilder] which builds a widget depending on the [valueListenable]'s value.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: A [valueListenable]-independent widget which is passed back to the [builder].
